name: simba-data-collector
description: Interactive web viewer for marine wildlife rescue data from SIMBA project

scripts.dev: echo 'ðŸš€ Starting development server at http://localhost:8082' && lsof -ti:8082 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && cd docs && python3 -m http.server 8082 --bind 127.0.0.1
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.collect-and-build: npm run collect-all && npm run update-data && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Build for deployment' && git push

author: Tiago Vignatti <tiago@vignatti.com> (https://vignatti.com)
